snippet.title: (L:149) The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring GBA Longplay
snippet.description:
A Full Game / Gameplay / Walkthrough / Playthrough of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring  NTSC Version on Game Boy Advance

Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring is and RPG based on the classic book by J.R.R.
Tolkien.  Lord of the Rings is a three-part book series about Middle-Earth, and the War of the
Ring.
FotR was recently made into an incredibly successful and incredibly good movie by New Line
Cinemas.  The cast was made up of some unknown actors and some of Hollywood's biggest, like
Elijah Wood, Ian McKellan, Liv Tyler, and Cate Blanchett.
The Game Boy Advance game is an RPG that follows the book more than the movie.

Timecodes:

0:00:00 - Start
0:00:30 - Introduction
0:04:25 - The Shire
0:31:52 - Crickhollow
0:46:53 - Old Forest
1:07:59 - The Barrow-Downs
1:18:02 - Bree
1:30:11 - Area Outside of Bree
1:39:37 - Midgewater Marshes
1:45:49 - Weathertop
2:00:36 - The Last Bridge
2:23:59 - Rivendell
2:32:48 - The Mines of Moria
3:57:36 - Lothlorien
4:18:16 - Falls of Rauros
